summary: This document is an Indenture dated November 17, 2025, between Ionis Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and U.S. Bank Trust Company, National Association, as Trustee, outlining the terms for issuing 0.00% Convertible Senior Notes due 2030. The Indenture details the obligations of the issuer, the rights of the noteholders, and the responsibilities of the trustee, including provisions for conversion, repurchase, and redemption of the notes.
